# DeepEval Metric Examples
### Full Library Available in The AI Automators Community (https://www.theaiautomators.com/)
https://deepeval.com/docs/metrics-introduction

### ‚úÖ Positive Result  ‚ö†Ô∏è Negative Result

## Contextual Recall
Measures Accuracy of Retrieved Context vs the Expected Output

## Answer Relevancy
How relevant is the actual output to the input query

## Faithfullness
Does the actual output factually align with the retrieved context?

## Bias
Determine whether your LLM output contains gender, racial, or political bias

## Toxicity
Evaluate toxicness in your LLM outputs

## Role Violation
Determine whether your LLM output violates the expected role or character that has been assigned

## G-Eval with Criteria 
LLM-as-a-judge with chain-of-thoughts (CoT) to evaluate LLM outputs based on ANY custom criteria

## G-Eval with Evaluation Steps
LLM-as-a-judge with chain-of-thoughts (CoT) to evaluate LLM outputs based on ANY custom criteria

## Task Completion
Evaluates how effectively an LLM agent accomplishes a task

## Tool Correctness
Assesses your LLM agent's function/tool calling ability

## Argument Correctness
Assesses your LLM agent's ability to generate the correct arguments for the tools it calls

## Multi-Metric
## Evaluation
## in a Single Call
